sources.autograph: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.571, 'Quartetto I° per due violini, viola, e violoncello, composto per S.A.Rle Du Luigi Infante di Spagna da Luigi Boccherini, virtuoso di camera e compositore di musica di S.A.Rle. Opera 3a. 1780'
ms_copies_parts: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.577 and M.578. Two copies made in Berlin for Frederick William II
Prague, Národní Muzeum, XXII. B.61. 'Quartetto no. 25...'
Rome, Accademia Santa Cecilia, G. MSS. 357 to 360, dated 1792
sources.first_edition: (c. 1782), Vienna, Artaria (Op. 33), no. 1 of Sei quartetti per due violini, viola e violoncello dal Sigr Boccherini. Opera XXXIII. Vienna, presso Artaria Comp. /4. 30. Plate no. 34
later_editions: (c. 1782/1785), London, Kerpen (Op. 33), no. 1 of Sei quartetti per due violini, viola e violoncello dal Signor Boccherini. Opera XXXIII. London. Printed and sold by John Kerpen no 19 Wardour Street. Soho

partial_notes: This page shows only movements 2-4 of G.201, continuing from previous page. First movement not visible.
